description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924, housed in a blue-green portfolio case with a title page; in green ink a man's head and eyes are tilted down and to the left; shoulders of man are barely visible beneath a band of dark green ink that runs across the bottom of the image; forehead colored in pink
inscription: LL below image, in pencil: 6 (8) | LLC of sheet, in pencil: E. 157 |  LR of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck / 1-9
portfolio: From Plate 3 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 22
title: Tired Head (Self-Portrait), Plate 3 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
